turns.utterance: Clowns have a long tradition of using lots of variety in their costumes
turns.response: I'm not sure how I really feel about clowns. I never thought about it much until the media started making them scary.

turns.utterance: I saw "It" and Im pretty sure how I feel about clowns.
turns.response: I saw that plus the remake and the remake makes clowns a lot more scarier. I'm surprised they still have them in the circus.

turns.utterance: I haven't seen the remake yet. Not brave enough.  The clown from Poltergeist was pretty evil, too.
turns.response: Clowns were so innocent I'm not sure when they started getting a bad rap.

turns.utterance: What was the name of the evil clown from American Horror Story?  That made it clear to me I was right to mistrust them.
turns.response: I know who you mean but I don't remember the name. I would probably freak out if a clown came too close.

turns.utterance: Did you happen to see The Killing Joke?  That's an evil clown in that one.  DC went way dark.
turns.response: No I haven't seen that. I think all of media needs to stop with the clowns, but it is probably way too late.

phrase: i didnt mention anything about clowns.
i saw it and im pretty sure how i feel about clowns.
